internal: An internal server error has occured.
unauthorized: You are not allowed to do this action.
azure_ad_denied: You are not allowed to use this app.
access_denied: You have been denied access to this content.
no_campus_assigned: You do not have a campus assigned to sign in, please contact your campus manager.
activate_acount: Your account has not been activated.
invalid_token: Your access token is not valid.
param_missing: You must specify the field "%s" as a parameter of your query.
param_format: The "%s" parameter must be in "%s" format in your query.
param_blocked: The "%s" parameter is not allowed for this query.
body_missing: You must specify the "%s" field in your request body.
body_format: The request body "%s" must be in the format "%s" in your request.
body_blocked: The request body "%s" is not allowed for this query.
query_missing: You must specify the "%s" field in the query.
query_format: The query field "%s" must be in the format "%s".
query_blocked: The query field "%s" is not allowed for this query.
resource_not_found: Resource "%s" with id "%d" could not be found.
email_taken: Email "%s" is already in use by an application user.
user_password_reset: Failed to reset user password. If the user is correct, please assign them a personal email address.
smtp_error: Failed to send email to "%s", contact administrator.
absence_missing_late_equal: Student cannot be marked as late and missing at the same time.
personal_email_required: This user does not exist in AD, so a personal email is required.
user_invalid_campus: User "%s" cannot be assigned to campus "%s".
user_already_in_classroom: User "%s" is already a member of class "%s".
user_not_in_classroom: User "%s" is not a member of class "%s".
campus_manager_taken: Campus "%s" already has a manager assigned.
grant_error: Failed to create user. Failed to add permission on Azure.
